description:
Yuki continues to gather stickers for his plate.
However, his points have stagnated since the boys stopped rotating "sticker duty."
While Yuki has kept in touch with Kayo, who also collects stickers, when he learns she plans to quit working in the cafeteria, their conversations run dry.
Looking back on his interactions with Kayo, Yuki decides to...
Source: crunchyroll
